website_summaries.verdict: The design of Altec Lansing's Mix iMT800 may not appeal to everyone, but its winning combination of good performance, lots of oomph, and portability makes it one of the best iPod speaker options out there.
pros: excellent sound for a system this size
two auxiliary inputs placed on the top of the unit for easy access
slot for storing remote, which also clips onto a belt
cons: would be nice if the system included a rechargeable battery

customer_reviews.title: Not fully compatible with newer iphones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used for $200 with no visible wear. High quality sound and build, but the iphone dock does not fit present day phones (2009 vs 2016 midsize iphone). I also have the 30 pin adapter, but that's not what I mean by bad a fit. An iphone 6 is just to tall and wide. You can loosely rest the phone up top in the trough underneath the handle, but it's awkward. With power from the wall socket the FM digital reception was very weak on every station, even outside. I'll be returning this. I see 'new' ones are being sold for around $700., in 2009 the MSRP was $300. I'd give this 2.5 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Rojjer Wabbit

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware !
customer_reviews.text: The item is sharp looking. But I was sent an item that had a short in it . It had a high pitched noise at turning on and then it would eventually disappear. Seller was not very accommodating with the return since he said it was returned damaged ( even though it was wrapped in bubble wrap and peanuts) .
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. We've owned this for several years. Amazing sound. Everyone comments on it when they hear it. Several of our friends and family have bought one after hearing and seeing ours. It's built like a tank, sounds great and is beautifully designed. It works perfectly with our old iphone 3s and our 4 and 4s. I'm not sure if they have a lightening adapter or updated model...but I hope so! I can't think of anything I would change... We're thinking about buying a backup, we like it so much!
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Sun

customer_reviews.title: A nice substitute for an actual sound system in a car
customer_reviews.text: I drive an old class car with no top, and I wanted to hear the tunes. But I didn't want to install a system and make the car unoriginal. It's a contest winner, and I like to keep it pure. I drive down the freeways of LA with this thing blasting in the passenger foot well, and I can hear it very well. Surprisingly loud. Driving down streets, I have to turn it down so as not to offend other drivers. People laugh when they see where the loud music is actually coming from. I'm very satisfied with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Krsco

customer_reviews.title: Much louder than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The technical details have been well covered by other reviews. I just want to say I am very pleased with my purchase. I feel it is a good value in fact I am sort of surprised at the price in relation to the overall quality. It sounds great, is simple to use, and it's very portable. It came with 5 adapters for different model iPods but my new classic fit fine without one. One other thing of interest is there is a sliding bar that goes over the iPod helping to secure it so you can move it around without fear of the iPod coming loose. It is a sturdy well designed piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: daidhaid

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I hesitated spending this much on a boom box, but I wanted to play the iPod feature on my iPhone at the store, and I wanted others to be able to play FM, but not use their personal scratched/dirty CD's of poor taste. This fit the bill. The sound is amazing for what the product is. The quality of construction is all there. I've not had an issue and the sterio reception is very good. Pricy for a box, but it sounds as if one is listening to a high quality sterio system. Nothing tinny, not too bassy -- and all is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Thinker

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound quality. Excellent for outdoor use. Great clarity at high volume. The only issue I don't like is you can't access your iPod playlists from the Altec's remote control. But that's probably more of an iPod issue and not the fault of Altec. Regardless, you can use your finger on the iPod to select your playlist and put it into shuffle mode or whatever... then use the Altec's remote from there. Was surprised at the quality of construction and the sound field. Would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: KLash

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected which is great given the quality of music it pumps out. It is very bass-y which will be good in some situations. Does have a nice depth of sound. Basic remote but nice storage location so you can't lose it. I don't have an iphone but the adapters I received didn't have one for an iphone 4 for those who do. Probably available with the 810 model. See no issues with the Amazon Warehouse version of this product. Can't wait to have it out in a party atmosphere. Do wish they threw in an AM tuner...
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Fun at baseball games and out by the pool
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an inexpensive solution to get music at our baseball games and the iMT800 did the trick nicely. It seems to fit all of the iPods we have in the house, so we took one of the old iPods and just put baseball-type music on it. The Boom Box has extra inputs so you can use a microphone to make announcements. We also bought rechargeable D-Cell batteries to run the boom box. With those rechargeables it's very portable and the rechargeable batteries last much longer than the disposable type.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Paseur

customer_reviews.title: yup. It really is a Boombox...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Loud like you won't believe for its size. Lots of features. Very nicely built. All the things they claim are true. No disappointment here. It is well worth the price, especially if you are getting it at the bargain prices it is being offered at these days (low 200's at Amazon, [...] and J&R). I hesitated due to cost over other units, but dollar for dollar, you cannot go wrong and you will forget about the money pretty fast once you get on to this thing! The others just don't compare.
customer_reviews.author: Ike17055

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This has pretty great sound for it's size. The remote works well with it and it is also pretty nice to be able to just carry it anywhere to where you want to listen to it. The shapes makes it perfect for setting in corners. Which helps the passive subwolfers to work better anyways. The radio picks up very well even with the antenna down. Ipod docking is a snap. The only thing that would have made this perfect in all respects is a CD player also. All in all, pretty nice sound, compact, and great price compared to the bose system.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barbret

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was faulty. Shuts off mid way. (common infamous problem) I will never buy from Altec EVER again just out of principle. Amazon A - Z Guarantee refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a boombox that was battery operated. I travel alot where there's no electricity. So recharging was out. Having the AC is a bonus for listening at home. I will primarily use this outdoors. The iMT800 has impressive sound for this size of boombox. It does have alot of bass. I turn it down and hear all the music and or singers. The remote control is small and does what it's suppose to do. I am happy with my purchase. It's just what I wanted in a boombox and the iMT800 is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tonithetiger

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about spening $200 for a product I had never listened to in person. But after reading reviews here and on CNET, I decided that this was the machine I would purchase and I absolutely made the right choice. The sound is great and I really like that you can plug several products in at one time and toggle between them with the remote. The FM transmitter is a great bonus. I know this isn't a technically savy review... but if you want to be able to crank up some Stevie Ray Vaughn while no one is home... you will be very happy with this product. I know I am!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: My parents were wanting to install an outdoor sound system for parties out by the pool, so I suggest looking into something more practical. I have had great luck with altec lansing products, and this was no exception. Don't be intimidated by the size in the pictures. It isn't nearly as big as you think, but it still packs a big punch. The sound gets very loud while still being crisp. I am sure my parents neighbors are not as big of fans of this stereo as we are.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Sounds better than a Bose wave radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my girlfriends birthday and when I heard it, I just had to have one for myself. So I ordered another just for me. It feels solid and sounds great. The two tweeters, two mids, and two "woofers" on the sides really make a nice full sound with plenty of bass for most of us. I really do think it sounds better than a Wave radio, and at half the price. I just wish it didn't cost so much, but a good boom box is hard to find these days.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ayotte

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for the best sound $200 bucks can buy, STOP LOOKING!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to shell out the $450 for a good Bose system, but thought I'd give this Altec Lansing a try because of all the good reviews and I'm so glad I did!!! The bass is amazing and fills up a good sized room. I don't think this system is a pretty to look at as the Bose, but who cares?! I have an extra $250 in my pocket and all the sound quality I was looking for. The remote is handy, the whole system is user friendly, and I just can't believe the sound that comes out of this $200 box! I feel like I have a little night club in my living room. GET IT
customer_reviews.author: Exvine

customer_reviews.title: My favorite accessory of musical entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of sound that comes out of this machine. I have had it for over a year and have never had an issue with its functionality. I use this as my central device for my music, video games and movies and am very pleased with the quality of sound from each of these uses. The only issue i have had is with the remote, after about 3 months the plastic button covers flaked off, but thankfully there is a second layer of softer plastic so the buttons still work. Overall I am very happy that I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C. Haupt

customer_reviews.title: I love this boombox!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing a good quality boombox for a long time, and have been studying on about a half-dozen of the most desired ones in the $200-$300 price range. I am an avid music lover and basically listen to music whenever and wherever I can, so I needed something portable because I am on the go constantly. This Altec boombox is AWESOME!!!!! The sound quality is amazing for this little of a system. It looks heavy, but it's not! I use it mainly with my IPOD, but when I want to use the radio, it's range is amazing! It states the artist and song title too - a bonus! I really love this system and you will too!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: $1000 is way too high for this speaker it is crazy it is only worth $300 does not matter if it is hard to find or get i really want a new one but will not over pay for what people are asking for it now it is stupid.
customer_reviews.text: i have owned this speaker twice now . and need a new one but the price that it is going for now is not worth it. $1000 is way too high for this speaker it is crazy it is only worth $300 does not matter if it is hard to find or get i really want a new one but will not over pay for what people are asking for it now it is stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not Purchase  - Google this model plus "Power Adapter"
customer_reviews.text: What a great sounding radio! Unfortunate to the many who purchased it there is a defect internally that disconnects AC power and renders the box useless. Mine would not power up so I borrowed a friends cord (same model) and it was still dead. That is when I went to Google and searched the model to see that everyone has this defect at about 14 - 16 months after purchase. Customer service for Altec Lansing is non-existent, I did send a note to Amazon to see if they would back it up.
customer_reviews.author: David Lear

customer_reviews.title: excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews that said this boombox was big. It's actually smaller than my Sony xplod, but the sound is simply amazing! Very impressed. It's pretty loud, though I haven't had it up all the way, but haven't needed to. It's a superb product and I love it! The bass has rich, deep sound, and the highs are crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: gemini

customer_reviews.title: Boom box
customer_reviews.text: Great product. All I use it for is my classic ipod. Not sure I really understand how to switch it with the provided remote in order to get exactly the playlist or group I want to play. I eventually get what I want to play. I still need to play with this aspect of it. Everything else is great. Great sound quality. Easily fills a room. Especially the bases are great, you can really feel the base beats.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing inMotion MIX iMT800 Reveiw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Altec Lansing inMotion MIX iMT800 a little over a month ago and I absolutely love it. The sound is fantastic for a portable and it is very easy to use and I love the belt loop remote control so it's always with me and I don't loose it. I have a 1600 SQ Ft shop and it fills it with sound great. I highly recommend this unit. Dave.
customer_reviews.author: FreeCarBuyingGuide-com

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: The Altec Lansing inMotion MIX iMT800 Portable Digital Boom Box for iPhone and iPod is amazing - both in sound and value. Whether it's in a small room or outside the unit delivers ear-appealing sound. I'm especially impressed with how loud the unit can get and with no, or little, distortion - at least to my ears. We recently took the box to a large outside party. Many people commented on how well the box sounded and couldn't believe all that sound was coming from such a small package.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Natural Sounding
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options with this unit, from one of the two aux inputs, I was able to connect my laptop which houses Spotify and play away. The sound is rich with a deep base and no distortion. I bought this for tailgating and it will come in handy during football season. Speaking of handy, handgrips are strategically placed for horizontal or vertical carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Frikor

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, bass is a little lacking but I am comparing it to the ikicker I had. Looks good seems pretty solid structure wise. Only reason it is getting four stars is that when I turn it up to around 25 my ipod touch(with the correct insert) will actually vibrate out of the plug with the sliding cover thing even infront of it. Other than what ive said it is a very good system. A bit expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: perfect boom!! box
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for great sound, portable, and able to connect other things like my xm radio or other Ipods. I also like having the Aux inputs on top of unit instead of on the back like on most other units. The 7 band graphic EQ is also a nice plus. I looked around for a nice speaker system that I could pick-up and take were ever I want my music with me. This is the perfect blend for me thank you Altec Lansing for designing such a nice system with great sound and portable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ulm

customer_reviews.title: Iphone docking
customer_reviews.text: The sound is wonderful, very full. I like that the base can be adjusted and the remote option is handy. This boom box has been moving from room to room with me as I listen to Christmas Carols. It is bigger than many other products of it's kind and that was a trade off for the good sound, the viewing screen and fully portable features.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pardue

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Thing has been pretty awesome so far. I've only had it for about a week or so. It has great sound and is pretty light. The bass is much deeper in a corner as some have said. That is due to the subs being built into the sides of the unit. Overall I'm completely satisfied and can't wait to bring it outside with me when I go to softball tournaments and such things as that. I would definitely suggest this to anyone and it honestly sounds better than the Bose for bass types of music (Rap, Rock, etc). I also heard the Dre system yesterday and for $200 dollars more...no thanks, I'll keep my Altec.
customer_reviews.author: TonyJ0502

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOM BOX!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the neatest systems I've ever bought. Can't believe the sound out of this unit. Bass is very strong. I use it with my iphone 4 and tune into Pandora.....awesome! There are several adapters to help the phone rest on the cradle. What I found is that if you have one of the protective cases, as most of us have, these won't work. The phone sits on the cradle without one just fine however.
customer_reviews.author: C. YEAGER

customer_reviews.title: The sound is fantastic. The bass is remarkable and impressive
customer_reviews.text: Light and portable. The sound is fantastic. The bass is remarkable and impressive. This thing rivals any and all of it's competition. Even out shines some larger component systems. Best iPhone / iPod boom box for the bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn D. Durst

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound!!
customer_reviews.text: these speakers sound amazing! and they are very affordable for the amount of sound they put out. it would be nice if the radio had programmable station buttons...that's the only reason i didn't give this item 5 stars. but, seriously, as far as the sound it puts out, I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: icaro_satsuma

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bose @ lower price w/ more features
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a good speaker for ipod touch, I always went back to Bose for sound quality, but price was too high. So i finally found this one. Its look may not appeal to everybody, but believe me, sound quality is as good if not better than Bose and with many more options like Digital FM radio and equalizer. Portable, still lightweight and powerful. Very rich and precise sound. I'll definitely recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Paipuky

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is the third and hopefully final iPod portable player I have had. A little pricy but worth the sales price i think. The last one I played two songs on it and put it back in the box. This one has great sound and bass for a portable system. It is perfect for playing in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Blue87FJ60

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone Boombox I have ever come across
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this thing for over a year and have nothing but good things to say about it. It is by far the best all around boombox for the iPhone I've ever seen. I've taken it camping, float trips, parties, if you need portable volume, this is the best player on the market. The batteries last much longer on this than I would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Conboy

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product.
customer_reviews.text: Best boom box out there for outdoor/camping etc. we take it to big sur three times a year for the last 3 years. no issues at all it sounds amazing and the battery life is superb. note it will not charge your ipod unless it is plugged in using AC adapter
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic1971

customer_reviews.title: Positive Review for Altec Lansing Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: This item is just what I was looking for, it has every detail I wanted. The sound quality is amazing, with a great volume range. The slick look to it is also very nice. This is perfect for people who are really looking to jam some music and have a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie K

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Digital Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: To keep this short and sweet, the sound quality is fantastic (the bass from such a compact device is so impressive), it's got a great look and feel to it, and its size and portability is really something special. I live in a pretty small dorm room, and this compact bad boy more than suffices as an easy listening device before going to bed or a party enhancer for dance parties in the room or on the floor lounge. It's also not as bulky or heavy to transport as others might suggest. I thought, and still believe, this product was an absolute steal at $200.
customer_reviews.author: W. Simonetti

customer_reviews.title: Best iPod/iPhone sound speakers around!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This iPod/iPhone dock is the best you can find out there. I own the Altec Lansing iM7 for 5 years now. It still working great but i was looking for something compatible with my iPhone 4, iPod Video (5 Gen), iPod Touch (1st Gen) and my iPhones 3s. The sound = UNBELIEVABLE. SUPER GREAT SOUND.....Treble, BAAAASSSSSSSS and mid well balanced and lot of options to custom your favorite set up of sound. Altec Lansing made it again!!!!!!!! The price ($172.00) is amazing. Much better than the $600.00 Bose new dock and with much better sound!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abel Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great boombox for the garage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Hubby's Christmas present after reading all the reviews. I am happy because he loves it! Fits his iphone, ipod & was able to easily hook up Sirus radio too. It's not the greatest looking stereo & you can not detach the speakers, but the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: susank

customer_reviews.title: def a good portable audio device
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy product. A little bulky but it compensates well by generating good bass. the remote is really handy and has all controls available on it. can clip onto a loop of a pant etc which is handy while u move around the room or in the open. I would have thought that for its size with the power plugged in it would generate deeper bass and better sound overall but that i guess would be an ideal product. iPhone4 works absolutely fine with it. it has 3 audio sources plus a tuner so that is real handy as well. Overall im happy with the sound and the portability and it therefore serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: koohmar

customer_reviews.title: Old School/New School
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the opportunity to have great sound that ran off of batteries instead of having to recharge a docking system all the time. We also wanted to be able to play CD's from our collection and not have to rely totally on an ipod...LOVE IT on all counts...great sound. We are using it on our boat. We bought the older version (800) because we didn't see all that much difference with the new version.
customer_reviews.author: Rsqared

customer_reviews.title: great so far
customer_reviews.text: I plugged in my ipod touch 4g and it worked great. The unit has a wonderful sound and the remote and charging works fine. I need to get some sticky backed foam tape to put between the ipod and the support, just to make things a little more secure since I am not using any kind of ipod case. I have only had the MIX for one day but so far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for an outdoor party in a relatively large area and are not disappointed. The sound is great! I love that it can run on batteries. We have not had to install new batteries as of yet and have played it for hours on end. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ColoDeb

customer_reviews.title: Sound is Excellent LCD Broken
customer_reviews.text: I just bought one from amazon via warehouse deals. The one thing that stands out is the sound quality. It is amazing however the LCD screen does not work a bit of a bummer for me even though I know I took a risk buying it used. I am considering whether or not to return it but I love the sound quality and when your an avid music listener like me sound quality is so important.
customer_reviews.author: Contemporary Mom

customer_reviews.title: My Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. In the pictures it looks really big and awkard. It's not. It is truly shaped like the old school boom box. It also has a carrying handle. The sound quality is awesome. It does not tell you how many watts, which is a draw back. But other than that great.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. JONES

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing always on top of my options
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for clear and deep sound on a portable device, this may be the right option, the only thing this boom box is missing is a usb port reader.
customer_reviews.author: Jose F. Conde

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped long and hard to find a true iPod boom box that could be powered by more than just 6 C batteries (this one takes 8 D's) and came across this phenomenal piece of equipment. I use it at the beach and the sound is absolutely amazing, even more so when you consider the volume compared to the size. Even with the bass turned slightly down to conserve battery power, the passive/active subwoofer system pumps out awesome bass and along with the mids and tweeeters, the full range of sound can be heard without distortion over twenty feet away. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing iPhone/iPod boom box
customer_reviews.text: It's quite simple...you won't find a better product to dock your iPhone/iPod and play all your itune songs! Incredible bass, great for the beach, picnics, or anywhere you might like to bring it. Great sounding boom box, fills any room in you house.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dressler

customer_reviews.title: Very good but...
customer_reviews.text: It works great especially when your iPod is in the Dock BUT if you connect your iPod with the auxiliary cable then the sound quality and volume are greatly reduced. I usually have the iPod in the dock so it works great for me. The radio works fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Completely Amazing Sound.
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I researched and tried out portable stereos, and even though the price tag seems too much, I regret nothing about buying this. The boom box sounds so much better than any other portable one I have ever heard! I use it in my workshop, outside while washing a car or in the barn when doing the chores. The best part of it is I can take it camping, and use one of the auxiliary inputs for the audio while playing a movie on the laptop. If having great sound anywhere you go is what you're looking for, spend the extra few bucks and get this one. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: ridesapaint

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent box but a problem with the power supply renders it unusable after a year and a half... Of course, out of warranty by the time it happens.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Works with iPad 1
customer_reviews.text: I bought a dock extender cable for my iPad 1. When connected it says not charging but I played Pandora radio for 5 hours and when I disconnected it was still at 100% charged. Its nice to play Netflix and HBOgo on the iPad and listen to it on IMT800.
customer_reviews.author: G. Valdivia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: you wouldn't believe the sound!
customer_reviews.text: Now I understand all the great reviews that this product has. You would not believe the sound that this thing produces, you'd think it was coming from a mini component. Great hi, mid and low responses, bass is wow factor, something that I am very particular with. Only con is the design, not really a head turner. Overall, its great for the money, you won't regret it, I didn't!
customer_reviews.author: Jassim P. Vailoces

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected...
customer_reviews.text: After doing extensive research for the right product to get for my very picky engineer husband. I decided on the Lansing. Got this for his birthday. He was very pleased and is recommending it to all of his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. If you are thinking about getting one, just do it you will not regret it. I have been wanting one for over a year now and I just couldn't believe the reviews but I decided about a month ago to go for it and I am glad I did. We have a huge backyard and this little thing fills every inch of it. You can actually hear the bass of this thing from the very back of the yard. I am telling everyone I know to go out and get one. I think anyone who owns an IPOD should have one.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Wow, bIg band in a tiny box!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best portable sound system I have ever heard. This replaced my old Sony boombox, you know the digital EQ and tuner one with cd dual cassette and removable speakers. This unit is almost half it's size but fills any area full rich tones, highs mids and lows. Even with the sound maxed out at 40, it was still crisp and clear, although much too loud for a 30x25 room at that level. The perfect system for a rec room or at the beach. Don't forget to read the manual on setting the EQ. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Doorman

customer_reviews.title: rockin box
customer_reviews.text: OMG this Box Rocks as soon as its turned on you can feel the deep rich sound in the room. Then turn it towards the wall and you have major sounds resonating throughout the room. I'd like to see a rechargeable model with a charger on deck. Changing out 8D batteries can be a drag an expensive if you use it as often as I do. My friends saw this thing an at least 2 have ordered the same model. The ipod connection sounds way better than the FM radio. I recommend you but this item in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: richie

customer_reviews.title: Good sound once the speakers are broken in
customer_reviews.text: This stereo system needs to be broken in before it will produce decent sound. After I first fired it up, the bass was so heavy that I filled out an RMA request at Amazon. However, after my rage subsided, I decided to give it a chance for a week or two. It turned out that the speakers just needed breaking in. It has been about two weeks since I started using it, and I must say that I am quite pleased with the sound quality. Consider that it is a boombox, it produces good sound.
customer_reviews.author: TwoFoot

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this stereo. High quality sound and great bass!
customer_reviews.author: TB363

customer_reviews.title: was a gift for my son and it has been ...
customer_reviews.text: was a gift for my son and it has been awhile since i bought this and he still uses this for his last outdoor party
customer_reviews.author: D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! I use this for my breakdancing practices and it absolutely kicks butt!
customer_reviews.author: Zam Tual

customer_reviews.title: sounds great-less filling
customer_reviews.text: well i never owned a Bose system so i can`t compare,i did read alot of reviews on this Altec and everyone seams to like it,i am not disappointed in what i paid for it,sounds great and you can crank it all the way,i think its worth the money if you love your ipod.
customer_reviews.author: Mohawk man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system; great value
customer_reviews.text: Great system, very loud at full volume (although not the loudest system out there) and has no noticeable drop in sound quality as the volume increases. Would definitely recommend this product from a friend. 2-day shipping from Amazon Prime arrived on time and in great shape).
customer_reviews.author: nic495

customer_reviews.title: GIGANTIC SOUND
customer_reviews.text: The iMT800 is an amazing docking station the sound quality is so rich and fills the room. The bass resonates through our house. The styling is a bit odd and the display could be better. All in all this is a super nice portable unit and will rock any party indoors or out. I highly recommend the iMT800 to any music lover that wants big sound from a reasonably small unit.Keep up the great engineering altec Lansing!
customer_reviews.author: STEELERS FAN 92

customer_reviews.title: Imt800
customer_reviews.text: I love this product , I believe that this product can compete with Bose . The sound is great and battery life is 30 hours ( which I haven't try yet waiting for summer) so far I approve
customer_reviews.author: Firestorm11

customer_reviews.title: nice mashine for outdoors, gives good base sound...little less on chrispiness, good for a buck...nice remote for the ipod as wel
customer_reviews.text: nice mashine for outdoors, gives good base sound...little less on chrispness...good punch for a buck +nice remote for ipod which charges even with the off mode...i've just ordered the reachargable bateries
customer_reviews.author: Slobodan R. Nedeljkovic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boombox!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product looking for something to play for my girls when they shoot around playing basketball in the gym. I had a smaller box that we struggled to hear. This item is great and I couldn't ask for any better sound quality for the price. I do have an iphone 4 which sits a little loose when playing, sometimes the bass vibrates the unit around but so far it hasn't disconnected. Overall great product that meets all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Ito

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bboying!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about a year and it's awesome! Been bboying with this and it is pretty loud. The sound quality is crisp compared to the other speakers my friends use to train. The shape is not too awkward either compared to either company's speakers so it is easy to carry. I bought the case with this too so it is less likely to get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: bboyho

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Great Volume, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Altec Lansing iMT800 for an outdoor party I was having. The party was in a backyard that is approximately 3/4 of an acre, so I needed a lot of sound and boy did this product deliver. People kept coming up to me and complimenting the sounds and volume of the iMT800. The iMT800 is so incredibly convenient due to its size and the fact that it can run on battery power or by its power cord. I am extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great boombox
customer_reviews.text: The best sound I could find in a boombox for this price. Bose and B&W have better sound but you'll pay. This box does a great sound getting the lows out with thebuilt in subwoofer. Very easy to use, kids will love it.
customer_reviews.author: ktmkrt

customer_reviews.title: Works ok with my iPod Touch 3G and my iPod Classic 5G and my iPod nano 4G
customer_reviews.text: Works ok with the iPod and the sound its ok, but it's hard to select your songs, you have to unplug it from the radio because it's hard to handle the iPod connected to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sancho Panzer

customer_reviews.title: Best boombox so far
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Still waiting for the ZUNE version so i can plug mine directy into the box without having to use the AUX port. It really kicks ass!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Mejia Gtz

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Husband - Altec Lansing Portable Digital Boom Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Valentine's Day gift for my husband. He uses this at work to amplify songs played on his iPod to help him stay awake when he works nights. He absolutely loves it! No complaints on any aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope McCollum

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: this product has a great sound and when I dropped it even though there was an indentation it still worked. it is a strong design
customer_reviews.author: J. Bart

customer_reviews.title: Bad connection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boom box for my fitness classes 2 month ago but, already back connection parts are broken. I just found out that they always have same problems with bad customer services. My 1year warranty is still usable but, people complaints about amount of times to fix and return. I am not going to buy this company product anymore.
customer_reviews.author: JUNGHAE KANG

customer_reviews.title: Oh Ya
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Super good base and super good range of sound. No problems with this. Have not tried it with batteries yet.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Wright

customer_reviews.title: iMT800 vs BOSE
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion I think that money spent on the BOSE SoundDock is a waste of money. The iMT800 has everything and more for the money that BOSE has to offer. In addition I also have the FM Radio that BOSE doesn't offer. The BIG sound quality is a plus also. For my money I would recommend the ALTEC iMT800
customer_reviews.author: D. PHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Beastly Sound. Great Product. Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is as great, if not better than advertised. Works with all iPods and iPhones (including iPhone 4), charges, and thumps out some serious sound. It isn't as heavy as a lot of people have mentioned (haven't tried it yet with batteries)... If you want top quality go with Altec Lansing. This speaker dock will blow your mind. It's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the charging post (where the cord plugs into the box has broken and it doesn't contain a charge.
customer_reviews.author: todnlis

customer_reviews.title: not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit on line (one of my first such purchaces) and was waiting like a kid waiting for a cereal box treat. I was very impressed with the solidness of the Mix 800 and the sound did not disappoint one bit. I'm interested to see how it works out in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Michael the drywaller

customer_reviews.title: Clean Sound
customer_reviews.text: I rate sound equipment on how it sounds on low volume. The iMT800 delivers a deep base and clean sound at this level. AS you increase the volume there is no distortion. Other people at work have commented on how good it sounds. In my opinion it outperforms the Bose. I bought this product at Amazon and as usual it was delivered fast.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas p.

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing iMT-800 - Super Product
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT product, sound is everything I thought it would be. Extremely responsive. Clarity through highs and lows is crisp and clear. Best bang for you buck. I like it better than the Bose System (which I also own). With the iMT-800 you get more for your money.
customer_reviews.author: F. Daher

customer_reviews.title: Big sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Would be nice if it was a little smaller, but all in all.. Great machine. Spend the money. You will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all cost! Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Product broke 3 months after purchase after moderate use. I contacted customer service 3 times, and they responded with an automatic meaningless template and did nothing about it. Poor product quality and poor customer service. I would not recommend buying the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Boullet

customer_reviews.title: Great , quality sound even when turned up.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for a Christmas present, she took it with her to college 3-1/2 years ago and still appreciates it and uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding . Lots of bass. excellent build quality and design!
customer_reviews.author: James Young

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but....
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't always recognize your ipod/iphone, rendering the remote useless except to adjust the volume. I normally have to 'play' with it to get it to recognize it. I have a gen 1 ipod and an iphone 4, have the same problem with both. But the sound is great! better even then the bose speakers I had been using. Willing to look past the issue with the dock because the sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Lambo

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect if it weren't for...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is fine. Remote works well. the multiple inputs are great allowing both my iPhone and laptop to connect. finally having the battery backup saved us during the blizzard of 2010. Where the issues are include: slow power up, slow switching between inputs, can't use a cradle if your iWhatever has a case. Only four presets on the remote, lame equalizer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Bad Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was the third Altec Lansing product I have purchased. The first, about two years ago, was returned under warranty due to a faulty iPod dock. That one was replaced and later broke due to bad power supply. I later purchased a second product and it broke after only 3 months of use due to a bad power supply. I then purchased the inMotion MIX and used it for less than 3 weeks and it too broke again due to bad power supply. Luckily Amazon took it back for a full refund but I will not buy Altec Lansing products any more. Bad quality - they sound great at first, but will break on you after minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Its worth the 207.00 I paid for it.It really sounds good.You wont find a better sounding poratable unit.It will work with the newer Ipod touch 4th. As far as looks not bad and who cares its the sound I wanted and it puts it out.Cant go wrong you wont find better for the price.Top of the line.Its pretty loud too.Charges my nano and my 4th gen Ipod touch just fine.
customer_reviews.author: music

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Clear!
customer_reviews.text: It has many great features. I think the most important one is the EQ. It is nice to be able to shape the sound to your liking. The other things I like are: Jacks for other iPods, Charging while plugged in and not in use, Programmable greeting, battery meter, and just FM (who needs AM anyway?).It is very portable(light), and the design projects the sound well. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Crow

customer_reviews.title: hands down... one of the best purchases i've ever made
customer_reviews.text: i bought this back in 2011 and hands down, it's one of the best purchases i've ever made. i listen to a lot of EDM and the kick is just grande. only negative i can see anyone complaining about is the weight... my solution, go hit the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Tiongson

customer_reviews.title: boom boom
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted it to go BOOM BOOM and the got what she wanted. It has good sound and a radio. You can connect an ipod and any other mp3 to it. And if shes happy you"ll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: RenoJosh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and bass
customer_reviews.text: This system is amazing!! Great for pool parties or anywhere where you want to crank up the music
customer_reviews.author: Donnie W. Robinson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound!! Love the style and easy portability. Everyone I show it to wants one too!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Cole

customer_reviews.title: wont last more than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Something wrong with the power supply, had the radio replaced once within a year-had to pay $50 shipping to get the new one. Less than a year later my new one is doing the same thing. Had great sound-too bad it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: McVicker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted - quality sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted - quality sound and easy to use. I can easily play my ipod song lists now.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Laslie

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound system
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% satisfied with the iMT800-- it has met all expectations and exceeded them in some regards, such as its ability to handle a large size room. It has no issues with space-- it will fill it with good, quality sound!
customer_reviews.author: T. L. M. Allison

product_meta.title: Altec Lansing inMotion MIX iMT800 Portable Digital Boom Box for iPhone and iPod
product_meta.description:
The Altec Lansing MIX Digital Boombox Speaker System was developed for the "DJ lifestyle"--for those people who know music and like to pick the play list to liven their scene. Multiple people can jack in their iPhone, iPod or other music device, and the MIX lets you toggle between sources on-the-fly. There's a 30-pin dock connector for the iPhone/iPod and two front-facing 3.5mm jacks so everyone can enjoy their tunes.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Altec Lansing MIX Digital Boombox Speaker System was developed for the "DJ lifestyle" -- for those people who know music and like to pick the play list to liven their scene. Multiple people can jack in their iPhone, iPod or other music device, and the MIX lets you toggle between sources on-the-fly. There's a 30-pin dock connector for the iPhone/iPod and two front-facing 3.5mm jacks so everyone can enjoy their tunes. The result? A party!




MIX iMT800 Digital Boombox Speaker System offers: 

 * Retro "Boombox" styling with advanced digital performance
 * Inputs for iPhone/iPod, and two additional aux-in jacks
 * Brightly lit LCD display for track information
 * Big natural bass, enhanced with XdB technology
 * AC and battery powered





Universal dock is compatible with both iPhone and iPod, and recharges while it plays your tunes. View larger.

High-contrast LCD lets you know your beat, track, artist, album and station display. View larger.Booming Stereo Sound
Of course, the combo of "DJ" and "party" requires loud and booming sound, and the MIX will deliver. Loaded with a 5.25-inch side-firing subwoofer and 5.25-inch tuned passive radiator, the MIX pumps out big natural bass, further enhanced with XdB technology for extra heavy punch. The sound is complete with a pair of 3-inch full-range drivers, a pair of 1-inch silk dome tweeters in a horn-loaded configuration. Beyond looking cool, the front-facing horns are engineered to disperse the high frequencies -- which are otherwise highly directional -- for great sound throughout the entire room. Quite frankly, the MIX gets loud.The MIX also features a brightly lit LCD display that tells you the track, artist and album being played from your docked iPhone or iPod. Also, FM station data is displayed when the radio is playing.

Tailored EQ
The MIX has various EQ options that allow the user to tailor or personalize the sound. The simplest and most familiar is an adjustment of separate bass and treble controls. For more technical tuning, a digital 7-band graphic equalizer allows custom cutting or boosting of specific frequencies. Or, there are four EQ presets where just a touch of a button will tune the EQ for specific music genres, either for rock, pop, hip-hop or simply flat.

FM Radio Tuner
For entertainment beyond the iPhone and iPod, the MIX has an FM radio tuner with four station pre-sets.

Moves with the Party
True to its retro boombox roots, the MIX runs on AC or battery power. You'll always know how much battery life you have because the MIX will tell you on its display. You can expect up to 30 ours of play with eight "D" sized batteries. And, the MIX has nicely weight-balanced handles so you can take it on the road or around the house just as easily.

Thoughtfully Designed Remote Control
Between parties the remote control stows away in its own cubby so it can always be easily found. At party time, use the clip-on carabineer so the remote is always handy to command the jams. The remote allows you to toggle between all of your music sources, including the FM radio and lets you control the on/off power, volume minus, volume plus, track back, track forward, EQ, play/pause, and the four preset buttons. The four preset buttons are used for both the FM preset mode and the EQ preset mode.

The MIX is covered by a one-year limited warranty.

What's in the Box
MIX stereo speaker system, remote control, AC power adapter, two (2) 3.5mm connection cables, Apple universal well inserts, and user's guide.

Maximum input flexibility with one universal well and dual aux-in jacks for iPhones, iPods, portable players, and music phones
